EmailTemplate.name: Lighthouse Customer Support Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Contacting Lighthouse
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
At Lighthouse 360, we are passionate about your success and are committed to continually improving the quality of the services and product we provide to you.
We would appreciate your feedback on our performance by answering a few questions regarding your recent request. This survey should take only a few minutes to complete and will help us ensure your success with our services and products.
Please click the link below to access the survey.
http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=d8svsyjbmvz2q2={!Account.Id}&q1={!Case.Id}
Thank you,
Lighthouse Support
